column5: hi all fishergirl72,and myself really like the new board and all,but we are having trouble with our avitars,and mine is just a square box with a little x in the top left hand corner i was doing it the same way as the other board but its not working here,im so not  a puter expert
I fixed you avatar. Note that when the window for the URL comes up, it already includes the 'http://' part.
